      • selectTemplate

        public Template selectTemplate()
        Prompts the user to select a Template for account creation.
        Returns:
        the Template selected by the user

      • createAccount

        public void createAccount(Template template)
        Creates a new user account using the input Template to define the list of Permissions, based on the user input.
        Parameters:
        template - a Template to initially set the Permissions for the user

      • deleteAccount

        public void deleteAccount()
        Removes the username and User object corresponding to the user input.

      • editPassword

        public void editPassword(java.lang.String username)
        Change the password of the User object corresponding to the input username.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the User whose password needs to be changed

      • editOtherPassword

        public void editOtherPassword()
        Change the password of another user, based on the user input. Only for select User types!
